'''17w43b''' is the second [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.13]], released on October 26, 2017<ref>{{snap|17w43a|October 25, 2017}}</ref>, which fixes bugs.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=17w43b|prefix=Minecraft
|;old
|114553|Crash caused by hitting alt-tab while in fullscreen.
|;previous
|121276|Loading files from data packs and sounds ignores subfolders (causing e.g. no sounds at all in 17w43a).
|121286|No subtitles are showing.
|121290|Changing languages in the languages menu doesn't have any effect.
|121300|Default resource pack overwriting custom resource packs.
|121335|Crash: Invalid escape sequence at line 4 column 37 path $.pack.description.
|121337|Resource packs do not sort by number.
}}</onlyinclude>
